308207.「ゆりかごの末裔は 理解できない。\n まだ ジア・クトと 戦うつもり。\n 切:
The Descendants of the Cradle cannot be
comprehended. You still fight Dia Kut.
Yet you lost your one advantage...

308208.「そうともさ。私は 楽観主義者でね。\n まだまだ 戦いようはある。:
Right you are. I'm what you'd call an
optimist. I'm not ready to give up just yet.

308209.「てなワケで 助言をもらいにきた。 \n ざっくり言うと 魔眼の月に潜入し\n:
Which is why I'm here to ask for some advice.
In essence, I'd like to infiltrate the Eye of
Evil and destroy its cannon superweapon.

308210.「滅浄の大光を放つ 魔眼砲さえ\n 封じてしまえば アストルティア全土が\n 攻:
The cannon is what emits that Purging Pulse. If we can stop that, then an attack on the entirety of Astoltia can be diverted for the
time being.

308211.「その後は フォーリオンを 魔眼の月まで\n 移動させ 大攻勢をしかける。この天:
Once we do that, we'll then move Fourion to the Eye of Evil and launch a full offensive. The Firmament is actually based on a ship
that crossed between worlds many years ago.

308212.「これが 地上に被害を出さず \n 戦いに終止符を打つ 最良の策だ。:
I believe this is the best way to end all this
fighting without causing any damage to
the surface world.

308213.「ルーベも 同じことを 考えていたの。\n あんたたちに残された手段は 魔眼の月:
Rubay was also thinking the same. All that
remains is to infiltrate the Eye of Evil and
lay waste to it.

308214.「でも 魔眼の月が浮かぶのは 超高高度。\n 生身で飛んで 到達できる高さじゃな:
But the Eye floats at an extreme altitude.
Flying alone cannot reach such a height.

308215.「なーに その点は心配ないよ。\n 天星郷の至宝 天の箱舟で ひとっ飛びさ。:
Weeeell, don't worry about that. The
Starflight Express, pride of the Firmament...
It'll take us there in no time flat.

308216.「ルーベの念晶環で ジア・クトのことを\n 調べたなら わかっているはず。:
If you have researched Dia Kut in our
Telecrystal Ring, then surely you know.

308217.「魔眼の月の 索敵能力は 優秀。 \n 捕捉されれば 接近前に撃ち落とされる。:
The Eye of Evil's ability to spot is
excellent. You will be shot down long before
you approach.

308218.「問題ない。その点も 対策済みだ。: Not a problem. I thought of that as well.

308219.「……潜入する者たちが 決死隊となるなら\n 成立する可能性はあると 判断する。:
...if those who infiltrate decide to throw
their lives away, then a chance of working
it might. Survival is quite difficult...

308220.「遅かったじゃないか。\n どうだ？ 天の箱舟は動きそうか？:
You sure took your time. Well? Is the
Starflight Express working?

308221.「それが……。天の箱舟を 起動させるには\n 莫大なエネルギーが 必要なんです。:
Well...it would take an immense amount of
energy to get it running again. I'd say at
least as much as one of the trial's cores...

308222.「ま～た あのときと 同じ決断を\n 迫られるのか。試練場を 墜とすか否か。:
Uuugh...are we really having to make this
same decision again? Do we really have to
drop one of the trial areas...?

308223.「のちの決戦を見すえれば ここで中心核を\n ひとつ失うのは 痛手だが……\n:
In preparation of the battle to come, it would be quite the blow to lose one of the cores... Do we have no choice but to drop it...?
Drop...it... huh?

308224.「そういえば お前が 過去へ行くのに立ち寄った\n 神代の島も かつては 天星郷:
Come to think of it, the Mythical Isle
you once visited used to be part of the
Firmament, but broke off a long time ago.

308225.「天星郷の一部だったなら\n 同じ仕組みで浮いている以上 神代の島にも\n 中心:
If it was a part of the Firmament, then that
means it would've used the same floating
mechanism and have a core of its own, right?

308226.「大昔に墜ちて 放置されたものなら \n 中心核のエネルギーも\n とっくに枯渇:
If it fell and crashed down a long time ago
and hasn't been used since, then I think
the core would be long depleted...

308227.「だが 残っている可能性もある。\n そこに 賭けてみよう。:
But there is a chance there is still something
left. We should bet on that.

308228.「中心核を回収できれば 万々歳。\n そうでないときは……苦渋の決断をしよう。:
If we can recover the core, then great!
If not, then...we'll have to make a painful
decision.

308229.「とりあえず <pc>と クリュトスで\n 神代の島へ行き 神殿跡を探索して\n:
In the meantime, you and <pc>
should go to the Mythical Isle and search for
a core inside the temple.

308230.「長年 放出されてきた エネルギーの残滓が\n 寄り集まって 魔物と化したのでし:
The energy's residue released over all these
years must've gathered together and turned
into monsters.

308231.「魔物が 中心核に 害を与えなかったのは\n 不幸中の さいわいと言えますが……:
We're really lucky that those monsters
didn't harm the core, though...

308232.「それ以上に 島が墜落したというのに\n 中心核だけ 残っているなんて……\n:
Beyond that, the fact that this island crashed
down and the only thing that remained was
the core...it's like witnessing a miracle.

308233.「おそらく 浮島墜落の原因は \n 浮力を発生させる 別の装置のほうに\n なん:
Perhaps it crashed due to some kind of
malfunction in the other device that allows
it to float.

308234.「天の箱舟から 取りはずしてきた この核納器に\n さっそく あの中心核を 移し:
I'll put the core inside this core container
I took from the Starflight Express.

308235.「あれだけのエネルギーが こんな\n 小さな容器に 収まってしまうとは……。\n:
To think that such huge energy could be
contained in such a tiny container...
Our ancestors' technology is amazing!

308236.「いつの日か 僕たちも\n ご先祖様に 引けを取らないだけの\n 技術力を 身に:
I hope that we can one day be as
technologically advanced as they were.

308237.「さてと これで 天の箱舟を起動させる\n 目途が立ちました。天使長の悩みの種を:
With this, we've made progress on getting the Starflight Express up and running. That's one less thing for the Archangel to worry about...
and I'm glad, too.

308238.「つねに きびしい選択を 迫られる立場は\n おつらいでしょうから……。:
It must be pretty tough to be someone in a
position where you are always forced to
make tough decisions, huh...

308239.「急ぎ 聖天舎に戻り ここでのことを\n 天使長に 報告しましょう。:
Let's hurry back to the Monastery and let the
Archangel know what happened here.

308240.「おお！ 待ちかねたぞ ふたりとも。\n で 首尾は どうなった？: Oh! You're both back! So? How did things go?

308241.「中心核の 保存状態が良好でしたので\n 無事に 持ち帰れました。\n 天の箱舟:
The core was still intact, so we were able to
contain it safely. I'll be able to get the
Starflight Express up and running now.

308242.「あー よかったぁ。ルティアナ様に 感謝だな。\n 試練場を つぶすなんて決断\:
Ohhh, thank Lutiana... I didn't even want to
think about making the decision to get rid
of one of the trial areas.

308243.「しかし すごいな……。こんな小さな物に\n あの中心核が すっぽり 収まるのか:
But it's simply amazing...the core really fits
inside that tiny object? That's a part of the
Starflight Express, right?

308244.「ええ。至宝と呼ばれるだけあって\n 未知の技術で 作られてます。\n 扱うこと:
Yeah. It's quite the valuable treasure, and it's made from unknown technology. I can handle it, but I still don't fully understand
how it works...

308245.「とこしえのゆりかごの 技術か……。\n 返す返すも 故郷を蹂躙してくれた\n:
Technology of the Eternal Cradle, huh...
Dia Kut is going to get the payback they
deserve for wrecking our homeland.

308246.「奴らに反攻をしかける 最初の一歩として……\n クリュトス。お前は 天の箱舟を:
As for the first step to launching our
counterattack... Krutos. I'll need you to get
the Starflight Express running ASAP.

308247.「はい！ おまかせください。\n かならずや 飛ばしてみせます。:
Got it! Leave it to me. I'll make sure she
flies.

308248.「<pc>さんも\n ご協力 ありがとうございました。:
Thanks a lot for helping us out,
<pc>!

308249.「私からも ひとつ……<pc>に\n 報告しておきたいことが あってな。\n そ:
There's one more thing I need to tell you
about, <pc>... It's...about Yuliza's
current condition.

308250.「依然として 意識が戻らない。\n 悔しいが 手のほどこしようが ないんだ。:
She still hasn't regained consciousness.
Sorry, but there's nothing we can do.

308251.「ひょっとしたら テトラル様のように\n 突然 目覚めるかもしれないし……逆に\:
Maybe she'll awaken suddenly like Tetral did,
or...maybe she'll be asleep forever.

308252.「ン……潜入作戦のことだがな\n 決行前に 詳細を詰めるため\n もう一度 ルー:
Ahem...I'd like to go and talk with Rubay one
more time to iron out the details of our
operation before heading in.

308253.「今度は 英雄たちを交えての 会議だ。\n 一緒に ルーベを監禁している\n 部:
We'll be meeting up with the other champions.
Please follow me to the room where we're
keeping Rubay.

308254.<pc>と ミトラーは 聖天舎を出て\n回生堂にいる ジア・ルーベのもとへ向かっ:
<pc> and Mitra left the Monastery and
headed for the rest spot, where Dia Rubay
was being held.

308256.「そりゃ そうだろ。\n 敵同士が 一緒にいるんだからよ。:
Of course I am! We are here with our enemy,
after all!

308257.「ミトラーさま。この方を頼って\n 作戦を立てていると 聞きましたけど\n 本当:
Mitra...I heard that you are relying on her to
help plan the operation, but...is this really
the right thing to do...?

308258.「不安は わかる。でもね ルーベを信じるのは\n こちらに寝返るだけの 理由があ:
I understand your concerns. But I trust Rubay because she has every reason to defect to our side. And above all, she's the only source of
information we have about our enemy.

308259.「ゲノスを 粉々に 砕いてくれるなら\n どんな相手とだって 手を組む。\n 裏:
To anyone who will smash Genos, we will work
with them. We will not betray you. As long as
our interests align.

308260.「時間が惜しい。さっそく ジア・クトとの\n 最終決戦の 詳細を詰めるとしよう。:
We're running out of time. Let's get down to
business about our final showdown with
Dia Kut.

308261.「魔眼の月を ぶっ壊しにいくってのは\n ちらっと 聞いてるよ。あそこまで\n:
I overheard a bit about how we're going to
destroy the Eye of Evil. I'm not really sure
how we'll get there, though.

308262.「至宝 天の箱舟を飛ばす 目途が立った。\n 魔眼の月に 到着するまで\n 快適:
The pride that is the Starflight Express is
ready to fly. I promise you a pleasant flight
until we reach the Eye of Evil.

308263.「箱舟に乗って 空の旅……ですか。\n 途中で 撃墜される可能性があるのでは？\:
So we are using that to travel through the sky...isn't it likely that we would be shot down? I don't think our enemy would let us
pass so easily.

308264.「心配ご無用。敵から 姿を隠すことができる\n アストルティアの楯の加護が 発揮:
No need to worry. Dia Kut will not see you
if you have the Shield of Astoltia. It will
conceal you from their sight.

308265.「とはいえ 敵地たる魔眼の月 潜入後は\n その加護も さすがに 通用しなくなる:
However, once you infiltrate, you will no
longer have that blessing. Prepare yourself
for unavoidable battles.

308266.「天の箱舟で 魔眼の月のどこに\n 着陸するかだが……ルーベからもらった\n こ:
The choice of where to land the Starflight Express inside of the Eye...that's all thanks to the information from this Telecrystal
Ring Rubay gave me.

308267.「ふだん 使われていない 搬入口があるの。 \n そこなら 待ち伏せにあわない。:
A service entrance exists that is not usually
used. There, you should not be ambushed.
Assuming you are not unlucky.

308269.「俺たちは 念晶巨人の核を 神剣で砕いた。\n 危険を冒して 潜入せずとも\n:
We shattered the Telecrystal Titan's core
with the divine sword. Why risk infiltration,
and just shatter the Eye of Evil the same way?

308270.「時間が かかりすぎる。高エネルギー反応を\n 付近に感知すれば 集中砲火を浴び:
It would take much too long. If a high energy signature is detected, you will be under heavy assault. You want to try? Are you
prepared to die?

308271.「結局 潜入するしか ないようだね。\n ジア・レド・ゲノスを討つまで 帰還でき:
I guess we'll have to sneak in after all. We
can't leave until Genos is defeated. We're
a suicide squad, if you will.

308272.「いや 目指すのは ゲノス討伐じゃない。: No. The mission is not defeating Genos.

308273.「この作戦の目標は 奴らの超兵器\n 滅浄の大光の 無力化にある。:
The goal of this operation is to neutralize
their superweapon, the Purging Pulse.

308274.「天の聖壇に撃たれた 裁きの閃光を\n 覚えているか？ 滅浄の大光は あれと\n:
Remember the flash of judgment that was shot
at the Heavenly Altar? The Purging Pulse is a
much stronger version of that.

308275.「その射程は アストルティア全土を\n とらえている。撃たれれば 逃げ場はない。:
Its firing range will hit the entirety of
Astoltia. If it fires, there'll be no escape.

308276.「あれは この世界を ジア・クトの生態に適した\n 環境に作り変えるのが 目的の:
A weapon with the purpose of remaking this
world into an environment suitable for Dia
Kut. This world will die. As will you all.

308277.「滅浄の大光を放つ 魔眼砲の機関部の破壊。 \n これこそ 本作戦の 最優先目標:
Destroy the engine of the Eye of Evil's cannon, the source of the Purging Pulse. This is the mission's top priority. After
that, return here quickly.

308278.「どう破壊するかは あとで教えるとして\n 問題は 潜入後 いかにして\n 魔眼:
I'll tell you more about how to destroy it
later. The problem now is how to reach the
engine once you infiltrate...

308279.「もし 潜入がバレたら ジア・クトが\n いっせいに 襲いかかってくるよね。\n:
If they find out we've infiltrated, then Dia
Kut will just send a horde after us. It will
be a total disaster...

308280.「その通りだ。敵地で 一丸となって\n 進むのは 悪手だからな……。\n よって:
That's right. Advancing as a single group in
enemy territory is not a good idea...that's
why I want you split up into teams.

308281.「それで 最初に 機関部に到達した班が \n 破壊工作をおこなう。魔眼砲さえ 封:
The first team to reach the engine will be the ones to sabotage it. If we can just disable the cannon, then we don't have to worry
about complete annihilation from the Pulse.

308282.「本当に ゲノスを倒さずに\n 帰還して よいのか？\n 奴を倒さぬ限り 戦いは:
Are you sure it's wise to return without
defeating Genos? This battle will not end
until he is defeated.

308283.「倒さないとは 言ってないよ。諸君らが\n 帰還したあと 天星郷を 魔眼の月へ近:
I'm not saying we won't beat him. After you return, we'll have the Firmament moved closer to the Eye of Evil to launch a massive
assault. That's when we'll beat him.

308284.「帰還後 諸君らに余力があれば\n ぜひ 戦列に加わってほしい。\n 説明は以上:
When you do return, assuming you have any
strength left, we'd like you to join in the
battle. That's all for now. Any questions?

308285.「よし！ 天の箱舟の 整備が終了次第\n 諸君には 魔眼の月に向けて 出発しても:
Very good! As soon as the Starflight Express
is operational, you'll depart for the Eye.
Until then, you may do as you please.

308286.「自由にって 言われてもなぁ……。\n そわそわしちまって 落ち着かねえよ。なあ:
Even being told I can do as I please...
I can't help but feel restless, ya know?

308287.「<pc>。お前に 少し頼みがある。 \n 回生堂の １階にいるから\n あとで:
I need a small favor from you,
<pc>. I'll be on the rest spot's
first floor, so please come and see me.

308288.「<pc>さんが 一番乗りだったんですね。\n お待たせして すみません。もう:
I see you were the first to arrive. Sorry for
the wait. The other champions should be
here soon.

308289.「なんだ なんだ。先客がいるのか。\n ずいぶん 張り切ってるじゃないか。:
What's this? There's someone here before you?
Someone sure seems enthusiastic.

308290.「クリュトスが 整備を急いでくれたおかげで\n どうにか 天の箱舟を 飛ばせるよ:
Thanks to Krutos' being quick about getting
things up and running, we somehow managed to
get the Starflight Express flying.

308291.「前にも言ったが 飛行中は\n 敵の攻撃に さらされることなく\n 魔眼の月に接:
As I said before, we will able to approach and
infiltrate the Eye of Evil without the risk of
exposing ourselves to enemy fire.

308292.「天の箱舟の操縦は クリュトスが担当。 \n 潜入後 英雄たちは ３班に分かれた:
The Express will be piloted by Krutos. After
you infiltrate, you will split into three
groups to destroy the cannon's engine.

308293.「編成は第１班が カブと ドルタム\n ナンナの三闘士で 第２班は ラダ・ガート:
The first group will be made up of Kabu,
Doltam, and Nanna, while the second will have
Lada Gart, Linashe, and Fostail.

308294.「そして 第３班だが <pc>と\n ハクオウの２名のみだ。アシュレイがいたなら:
Lastly, the third group will have
<pc> and Hakuo. If Ashley were still
here, he'd be in this group as well...

308295.「言っても 詮無いことです。\n 彼は もう……いない。:
It's pointless to say any more.
He is...already gone.

308296.「そうだな……。各班のリーダーだが カブ\n ラダ・ガート <pc>に担当しても:
Right... As for the leaders of each group, that will be Kabu, Lada Gart, and . If the three of you could
come here a moment, I have something to give you.

308298.「これらは ジア・ルーベの念晶環を解析し\n 聖天のレンズで 生成したものだ。\:
I generated these by studying Dia Rubay's Telecrystal Ring and by using the Divine Lens. I somehow managed to squeeze out enough for
three people.

308299.「念晶環は 魔眼の月の内部を 移動する際に \n 必要となる。また 魔眼砲の機関:
Those Rings are needed to be able to move about inside the Eye of Evil. The instructions on how to destroy the cannon is also
recorded inside them.

308300.「競争ではないが 一番乗りで \n 魔眼砲の機関部に たどり着いた班が\n 破壊:
It's no race, but...the first team that's able
to reach the cannon's engine will be the
first ones to destroy it.

308301.「念晶環に記録された情報は 天の箱舟で\n 移動中に 皆で 共有しておくように。:
The information recorded in your Telecrystal Rings should be shared amongst everyone while flying on the Starflight Express. So, does
anyone have any questions?

308302.「あなた方 天使は この作戦に\n 参加しないのですか？:
The angels will not be a part of this
operation?

308303.「潜入には 参加しない。\n 率直に言って……我々は足手まといだ。:
We won't be helping you infiltrate.
To be frank...we'd just slow you down.

308304.「ごめんなさい。英雄たちでなければ\n この作戦を 成功させられないのよ……。:
We're sorry. For a mission like this, it'll
take champions like you to make sure it's
successful...

308305.「くやしいが 彼女の言うとおりだ。\n 俺たちは お前たちの成功を信じ\n その:
I hate to admit it, but she's right. We
believe that you'll succeed, and be at the
ready for the assault to follow.

308306.「魔眼砲の破壊に 成功したら\n すみやかに 天星郷に帰還してくれ。\n まちが:
If you do succeed in destroying the cannon,
return to the Firmament immediately. Do not
try to challenge Genos.

308307.「ゲノス討伐を目的とした 大攻勢の成否は\n お前たちに かかっている。いろいろ:
The outcome of our assault on Genos all depends on you. I know you all may have your own thoughts on this matter, but...
You're the only ones who can do this.

308308.「了解したよ。そろそろ 出発しようか。\n いつ なんどき ジア・クトの超兵器が:
Understood. Shall we be off, then? There's no
telling when Dia Kut's superweapon may fire
at the surface.

308309.「吉報を待つ。ルティアナ様のご加護が\n 皆に あらんことを！:
I'm eagerly awaiting the good news of your
success. May the blessing of Lutiana be with
you all!

308311.「お前 また 後先考えずに！\n 神化に失敗したことを もう忘れたのか！:
Again without thinking first?! Have you
already forgotten that your deification
failed?!

308312.「悔しいが 我々は 戦力として劣る。\n 作戦の遂行を さまたげるだけだ。:
It's frustrating, but we're just not strong
enough for combat. We'd just get in the way
of the operation.

308314.「ひとりぐらい\n 一緒に戦う天使が いたっていい！:
If it's just one angel fighting together with
them, it should be fine!

308316.「いいさ……。好きにさせてやろう。\n 言って聞くような タマじゃないしな。:
It's fine... I'll let her do as she pleases.
She's not the type to be persuaded by
just words anyway.

Yuliza, you need to go too! I can handle the
rest on my own!

308461.「あなたって人は！\n また 生前と同じ過ちを くり返すのですか！\n 私たちを:
Are you really going to make the same mistake
again?! You have to trust us!

308462.「信用しているからこそです。\n ほかの皆も 私たちと同じように\n 魔眼の中枢:
It is because I trust you. I'm certain that
the others are trying to get to the core just
as much as we are!

308463.「ここで モタモタしていられません。\n 私も かならず 合流しますから！:
You can't afford to be slowed down here.
I will join you again soon!

308464.「ハクオウの言葉を信じ\n 今は 先へ進みましょう。:
I'll believe in Hakuo's words. Let's keep
moving for now.

308465.「天星郷で得た 信頼と友情……。\n 私は もう ひとりではない。\n 背中を預:
The trust and friendship I gained while at
the Firmament... I am no longer alone. I
have companions that I can rely on!

308466.「よもや 第二の魔眼砲が 存在していたとはね。\n ころばぬ先のキラポンという:
That there was a second cannon all along...
I'd like to ask Dia Kut if they're familiar
with the phrase "look before you leap".

308467.「くそっ すべての扉を 開放すると\n 言っていたが ここだけは別のようだ。\n:
Damn it! He said all of the doors would open,
but not this one, it seems. If only we had the
divine sword, we could break through this...

308468.「<cs_pchero>さまも わたくしたちと同様\n きっと ここを目指してい:
I'm sure <cs_pchero> is on their way
here just like us. We should just be patient
and wait for them to arrive.

308470.「左様。歓迎しよう。\n ゆりかごの末裔たちよ。:
You are correct. I welcome you.
Descendants of the Cradle.

308471.「過去に あまたの種族を 滅ぼしてきたが\n 我が居城の最奥 魔眼の中枢まで\n:
In the past, we have destroyed many races.
However, none have ever infiltrated the core
that lay in this fortress' deepest reaches.

308472.「ゆえに そなたらを評価している。\n 入るがいい。謁見を許そう。:
I am therefore honored by your presence.
You may enter. I will grant you audience.

308473.「臆したか…………つまらぬ。: Afraid, are you? What a bore.

308474.「余を滅ぼす またとない機会。\n 万にひとつの 勝機に賭けぬというのなら……。:
This is your one chance to destroy me.
So you wish not to stake everything on your
feeble possibility of victory...

308475.「臆病者に 拝謁の栄誉は与えられぬ。:
Cowards will not be granted the honor of
my audience.

308476.「行きましょう！ あいつを倒せるのは\n 今しかありません！ 時が来たんです！:
Come on! This is now or never! We can beat
him!

308477.「よくぞ言った！ お前の決断に乗るぞ。: Well said! I'll follow your lead!

308478.「光に魅入られた羽虫は そうとは知らず\n 炎の中に 飛び込むというが……\n:
Like moths to a flame, drawn to the light...
They dive into the fire none the wiser...
You are just like those insects.

308480.「なかなかに 壮観であろう？\n 血肉を持つ者が 結晶化した姿には\n 得も言わ:
Quite the spectacle, is it not? The
crystallized form of flesh and blood
carries an indescribable dignity.

308481.「ジア・クトの結晶化は\n もう きかなくなったはずなのに……。:
Dia Kut's crystallization should no longer be
working...

308482.「万象の王たる余を 見くびるな。\n そなたらの 結晶化をふせぐ 技術など\n:
Do not underestimate meーRuler of All.
Your ways of preventing crystallization
are powerless before me.

308483.「私たちだけで このジア・レド・ゲノスを\n 倒せるでしょうか……。:
Can we really defeat Genos all by
ourselves...?

308485.「戦いになど なるものか！\n 目の前の現実！ とくと見よ！:
There will be no battle to speak of!
See the reality in front of you! Behold!

308486.「余の光を 受け止めるか……！？\n 他の虫けらとは 格が違うようだ。:
My light, stopped?!
Perhaps you are different from these
other insects.

308487.「段々と 威力を上げてやろう。\n どこまで 耐えられるかな……。:
Slowly, my power shall increase...
How long can you bear it, I wonder?

308488.「早くも ふせぐ手立てが なくなったな。\n どうする？ 命乞いでも試してみるか:
You're quickly running out of options to
stop me. What will you do? Beg for your
pathetic lives?

308489.「あなたは 逃げてください。 \n 私が盾になります！:
You should get out of here. I will protect
you!

308490.「再戦の機会は かならず あります。\n あなたは その戦いに欠かせない英雄なん:
There will always be another chance to fight.
You are the champion this battle needs!
That's why you must live on!!

308491.「仲良く 彫像になるがいい！！: Togetherーyou will be still as statues!

308492.「未来への希望をつなぐ 礎になれるなら \n この命 差しだしてもいいッ！:
If my life can pave the way to a brighter
future, then I'll offer it without hesitation!

308493.「私は……人を愛するために\n 生まれてきたのだから！:
I... I was born for the sake of loving
others!

308495.「光輪！？ 旧き世の天使にしか\n ないはずなのに……神化の効果が\n 今になっ:
A halo?! Those only belong to angels of the
old world... Did the effect of the deification
finally manifest itself?

308496.「神化だと……？\n なるほど。そなたらには\n 自分たちの神を生む 秘儀がある:
Deification, you say...? I see.
You possess a secret ritual that gives birth
to your gods.

308497.「<cs_pchero> 前言撤回です。\n 今の私たちなら ゲノスを倒せます！:
I retract my previous statement, <cs_pchero>!
We can defeat Genos now! Let's end this, here
and now!

308498.「気が変わった……。そなたらには\n 余が じきじきに手を下そう。たまには\n:
I've changed my mind... I will deal with you
quickly. A telecrystal must not rest on its
laurels, lest its brilliance be dulled.

308499.「ありったけの命脈を 神剣に \n そそぎましょう。そして 最大級の一撃を！:
Pour every ounce of your life energy into
the divine sword! Unleash a strike like
never before!

308500.「ああ！ 出し惜しみは しない！: Yes! I will spare no expense!

308501.「<cs_pchero> 今です！\n この一撃に すべてを かけましょう！:
Now, <cs_pchero>!
Let's put our everything into this one
strike!

308502.「やったね！ <cs_pchero>兄ちゃん！\n これで もう 大丈夫だよ！:
You did it, <cs_pchero>!
Everything should be fine now!

308503.「やったね！ <cs_pchero>姉ちゃん！\n これで もう 大丈夫だよ！:
You did it, <cs_pchero>!
Everything should be fine now!

308504.「そんな！？ あれは……魔眼の月の破片？:
What?! Is that...a piece that broke off from
the Eye of Evil?

308505.「いや ジア・クトの船の 残骸だ……。\n あんな物が落ちれば 町ひとつくらい\:
No, it's the wreckage of Dia Kut's ship...
If that were to crash, it could wipe out
an entire town!

308506.「町ひとつで済めば まだ マシ……。\n 大陸ひとつ 焼き尽くしかねないね。:
If it were just a single town, that would be
better...but it could end up consuming an
entire continent.

308508.「間に合わないかも しれませんが……\n もう一度 神剣を使いましょう！:
We may not have enough time, but...
Let's try using the divine sword again!

308510.「あんな石ころ ひとつで……ボクらの努力を\n 帳消しになんか させるもんか！:
A small pebble like this, erasing all of our
hard work...? I won't let you!

308511.「せめて……海に 落とせれば……。 \n 兄ちゃんと 姉ちゃんには できたんだ！:
If I can just..direct it towards the ocean....
If my brother and sister could do it...
then so can Iーー!!!

308513.「みんなで 穴ぐらを出たときも\n こんな夕日を 見たっけ……。:
I remember seeing a sunset like this when we
all left the cave together...

308514.「ボクも みんなを導く 光になれたかな？\n あの日の 兄ちゃん みたい……に…:
I wonder if I could be the light that guides
everyone...? Just like my brother did...
that day...

308516.「これは あなた方がいなければ\n なしえなかった 勝利です……。\n ありがと:
This victory would not have been possible if
it hadn't been for all of you... Thank you so
much. Words can't express our appreciation.

308517.「……戻りましょうか。天星郷の皆も\n 報告を 待っているでしょうから……。:
...shall we go back? I'm sure that everyone
back at the Firmament is waiting for our
return...

308518.「魔眼の月の 消滅を確認した。\n 何があったか 聞かせてくれ。:
The Eye of Evil is finally gone.
Please, tell me everything that's happened.

308519.<cs_pchero>は ジア・レド・ゲノスを\n倒したことや 神剣で魔眼の月を:
reported on their defeat of Dia Ledos Genos, the shattering of the Eye of Evil with the divine sword, and the entire
battle.

308520.そして その勝利が カブやナンナ\nドルタム ハクオウらの犠牲によって\nもたら:
They also sadly announced that victory came
at the sacrifice of Kabu, Nanna, Doltam, and
Hakuo.

308521.「察しは ついていたよ。 \n ここに いないんだものなぁ……。\n あまりにも:
I had a feeling, since they are not here...
They paid too great of a price...

308522.「しばし 散っていった英雄たちのために祈ろう。\n 彼らの魂が 創世の女神の御許:
Let us take a moment of silence and pray for our fallen champions. May their souls find their way to the Goddess of Creation, and rest
in peace...

308523.「天星郷を……いや アストルティアを\n 代表して 礼を言わせてもらおう。\n:
On behalf of the Firmament...no, of all of
Astoltia...I give you my thanks. We are
eternally grateful, champions!

308524.「さっきから 気になっていたのだが\n ユーライザ……妙な格好をしているな。\n:
I noticed that Yuliza is dressed quite
strangely. She looks like an angel from the
old world.

308525.「遅ればせながら 神化を果たしました。\n 私も ここにいる英雄たちと同じく\n:
I have achieved deification, albeit a bit
later than I'd hoped. I am now among the gods
like the other champions here.

308526.「……ユーライザ神に 後事を託し\n 私は 隠居したほうが いいのかな。:
Maybe I should just leave Yuliza to tend to
things here and go into retirement...

308527.「正気ですか！ 神とはいえ まだユーライザに\n 天星郷の長が つとまるワケがな:
Are you crazy?! Yuliza may be a god now, but
how could she lead the Firmament?

308528.「ユーライザ神……おもはゆいです！: Me, called a god... I'm so embarrassed!

308530.「しょっぱいなぁ……。\n 人生の味がするよ モーモリーナ。:
It's really salty....
It tastes kinda like life, Sanguilina.

308531.「ありがたく いただくことね。\n 完食すれば 神には なれなくても\n １ラン:
You should gracefully accept it. Even if it
doesn't make you a god, who knows? Maybe
it's your ticket for moving up in the world.

308532.「くさった死体とか。: Like a Walking Corpse, for example...

308534.「ちょっとちょっと みんな～。\n ここは 笑う所じゃないのよ～。:
Hey, come on, everyone!
This isn't the time to be laughing!

308535.「気を落とさないでね。\n この戦いで あなたが示した 勇敢さと\n 気高さは:
Don't be disheartened. The bravery and
nobility you showed in this battle has
been recognized by everyone.

308537.「ただの天使に 戻ってしまいました。\n それでも あなたや……人間たちを\n:
I've returned to just being a mere angel,
but... I'll continue to protect you...and
all other humans!

308538.「こたびの戦いで ジア・クト念晶体の\n 魔の手から 世界が守られたことを\n:
Most people on the surface do not know that
this battle has protected the world from the
wicked hand of the Dia Kut telecrystal.

308539.「ジア・クトの侵略は アストルティアの歴史に\n 残らないだろうし それでよいと:
This may also not leave a mark on
Astoltia's history...and to be honest, that's
just fine.

308540.「だが 我ら 天星郷の民は\n この戦いに身を投じた 英雄たちの生き様を\n 記:
But we of the Firmament will remember the
lives of these champions, and pass on their
deeds to the generations to come!

308541.「さて かたい話は これくらいにして \n ここで私が 一曲 披露しよう。\n:
Well, I think that's enough serious talk for
one day, so how about I perform a song for
you? It's called "The Lamenting Angel".

308542.「……なんて思っていたんだが 代わりに\n 極上の歌い手が 名乗りを上げてくれた:
...but I thought, instead, that an exceptional
singer should step forward!

308543.「始源の歌姫 リナーシェだ！\n 拍手で お迎えしてくれ！:
Linashe, the First Diva! Please welcome her
with a round of applause!

308544.「じつは 天使長さまに 無理を言って\n この場をもうけて いただきました。:
I am very grateful to the Archangel for giving
me this opportunity.

308545.「わたくしが 天星郷への招きに応じ\n 英雄になると決断したのは……\n この上:
It was for the most selfish of reasons that I
accepted the invitation to the Firmament and
decided to become a champion.

308546.「最愛の妹……アリアが残した国を 守るための\n チカラがほしかった。その 一心:
I wanted the power to protect the country my
beloved sister Aria had left behind. That was
my only wish.

308547.「英雄とか 神とか どうでもよかった……。: I didn't care about champions or gods...

308548.「ですが 思いがけず 子孫と触れあう\n 機会を得られ 彼らの未来を守れました。:
However, I had an unexpected opportunity to interact with my descendants and protect their future. Now, I feel proud to call myself
a champion!

308549.「この戦いで 死んでいった者たちの魂を\n なぐさめるために。そして……:
To comfort the souls of those who died in
this battle. And...

308550.「生き残った者たちを 祝福するために \n 歌います。それでは 聴いてください…:
I sing this song to bless those who survived.
Now, please listen...

308551.「おどろかせて すまない。\n 彼女は 消滅を予期していたんだ。:
I'm sorry to have scared you. She was
already expecting herself to disappear.

308552.「最期に 歌で皆を祝福したいと\n 頼まれてな……。ただ しめっぽくなるのは\n:
So she asked me if she could bless you all
with one final song...and asked me to keep it
a secret as to not dampen the mood.

308553.「けど こんなに早く 消えてしまうとは\n さすがに 予想外だったよ……。:
But I wasn't expecting her to disappear so
soon...

308554.「ここは リナーシェの思いを汲んで\n しめっぽくなるのは なしだ。:
We have to keep our spirits high here just as
Linashe would've wanted.

308555.「食事と飲み物を 山ほど 用意した。\n 今夜は 思うぞんぶん 食事を楽しんで\:
We've prepared much food and drink for you all. Enjoy the festivities to your heart's content, and let it be your strength for
tomorrow. That is all.

308557.「これを お前に渡すよう\n リナーシェ殿から 頼まれていた。\n 受け取ってく:
Linashe asked me to give this to you.
Please take it.

308559.親愛なる <pc>さまへ。\nこのような形で 別れを告げることになり\nごめんな:
"To my dearest <pc>...
I'm sorry that I have to say goodbye
to you in this way..."

308560.おぼえていますか？ レーンの村へ\n海を見にいったことを。あのとき もう少し\n:
"Do you remember? We went to Rane Village
to gaze at the ocean. I told you that I wanted
to spend a little more time together."

308561.家族以外で 安らぎを覚えられるような人は\nあなたが 初めてだったから……\nあ:
"You were the first person outside of my
family that I felt comfort with...
and I didn't want that time to end."

308562.他人を信じず 頼れぬまま 生きてきましたが\n心域まで 助けにきてくれた あなた:
"I lived my entire life without trusting or
relying on anyone, but then you came to
my rescue and changed my heart."

308563.あなたに会えて よかった。\nあなたと同じ時を過ごせて よかった。\nあなたが生:
"I'm so happy that I met you...
so happy that we spent time together...
so happy that I could protect your world..."

308564.さようなら。あなたと あなたの愛する人たちが\nいつまでも 幸福でありますように:
"This is goodbye. May you and the ones you
cherish have eternal happiness. I'll keep
wishing that, forever and forever."

308565.「リナーシェ殿は 立派な英雄だった。\n お前も つらいだろうが…………ん？:
Linashe sure was an amazing champion.
It must be pretty hard for you, too...
Huh?

308567.あなたのとなりで カンティスさまが\nさぞ 気落ちしていることでしょう。\nどう:
"I'm sure Kantis is standing next to you
and must be quite depressed. Please comfort
him for me, won't you? <heart>"

308568.「天使の心まで お見通しとは……\n やはり あの方は とんだ女狐だ。:
To see into the hearts of angels...
She truly is a vixen after all.

308569.「やあ <pc>。\n 君も 外の空気を 吸いにきたようだね。:
Hey, <pc>.
Looks like you came out for some fresh
air, too.

308570.「宴も たけなわ。名残惜しいが \n 勝利の宴も そろそろ おひらきかな。:
The party's in full swing. Though it's a
shame, it's about time for the celebration
end.

308571.「……リナーシェまで 消えてしまうとはね。\n 何も言わず 去るというのが\n:
...I wasn't expecting Linashe to disappear,
either. To leave without saying anything...
that's just like her.

308572.「おや？ ひょっとして 君にだけ\n 何か 言葉を残していったのかな？:
Hm? Did she leave any words for you, by
any chance?

308573.「私も 消えるときは 君にだけ\n 遺言を残すとしよう……フフ。:
When it's finally my time to disappear, I'll
leave my final words only for you...
Hmm hmm.

308574.「今のは うめき声かな？\n 近いようだ。行ってみよう。:
Was that a groan? It seems to be close.
Let's go look.

308576.「これは これは……神様。\n いいところに 来てくれやがってよぉ……。:
Well, well...if it isn't one of the gods.
You've come just in time...

308577.「ジア・クトの捕虜が うろついてたんで\n とっ捕まえようと したんだが……\n:
That Dia Kut prisoner was around here, so
I tried grabbing her, but...then she turned
on me... Hurgh!

308578.「あの野郎……何を たくらんでるのか……。\n 神化の光炉は どこにあるのかって:
What...was that freak up to...? They
threatened me, asking me where the
Furnace of Deification was.

308579.「この頂上にあるって……答えておいたぜ。\n 上にある光炉は ガラクタ同然なのに:
I told her that it's all the way up there... even though the one up there is nothing but junk. Heh, heh...and they fell for it.
Serves them right.

308581.「ラダ・ガート……だけだ。\n ついさっき 捕虜を追って 上に行った。:
Only...Lada Gart. He went up there just a
moment ago in pursuit of her...

308582.「最期に話すのが お前だなんてな……。\n ルティアナ様の ひざに抱かれて逝くの:
You're really the last person I get to talk
to, huh... My dream was to die in the lap
of Lutiana, but...this isn't so bad either.

308583.「天星郷を守ってくださった 神様みたいな\n 英雄に見守られて 逝けるなんざ\n:
There's no greater honor than to die under
the watchful eye of a godlike champion...
One who protected the Firmament... Guh!

308584.「君は ラダ・ガートの加勢に。\n 私は ミトラーたちを呼んでくる。:
You go and join Lada Gart. I'll go get Mitra
and the others.

308586.「お前のおかげで よい息抜きができた。\n のんびりした時間を 過ごすのも 悪く:
I've had a nice break, thanks to you. It's
never a bad idea to take things easy every
so often.

308587.「アシュレイが消え ユーライザまで\n あんなことに なってしまった……。\n:
Ashley is gone, and Yuliza is not far behind,
it seems... You were close with both of them,
were you not?

308588.「落ち込んでるかも しれないと思い\n 気晴らしに さそってみたのだ……。\n:
I thought you might be feeling down, so I
invited you out here as a distraction...
Perhaps it was out of character for me.

308589.「……らしくないと言えば 今日の俺は\n しゃべりすぎだな。昔のことばかり……。:
Speaking of being out of character...I've
talked too much today. Dwelling on the
past...

308590.「いい機会だ。娘のことを……\n ガラテアのことを 聞いてくれ。:
It's a good opportunity. Let me tell you about
my daughter...Galatea.

308591.「ガートラント 建国の際 封印されていた\n 魔祖の血族を 解き放った話は もう:
Did I not tell you about the bloodline of the
Antecedents being unleashed? That began
the long battle against them all.

308592.「後世に 憂いを残すまいと\n 魔祖の血族を 根絶やしにするため\n 全身全霊で:
I fought with everything I had to eradicate
the Antecedents' bloodline, so as to
prevent anguish for future generations...

308593.「だが 魔祖の血族をひきいる\n 羅刹王バラシュナは 手ごわく\n 戦況は日々:
However, Varashnaーtheir leaderーwas a
formidable opponent. The battle raged on,
each day bringing advances and retreats.

308594.「当時の俺は 娘のガラテアに 城をまかせ\n みずから 激戦地で指揮を執っていた:
Back then, I was commander on the battlefield,
and left the castle to my daughter, Galatea.
Tragedy struck where I was not.

308595.「……ガラテアが 羅刹王バラシュナに\n 一騎打ちを 挑んだのだ。:
Galatea challenged Varashna to one on one
combat...

308596.「ガラテアと バラシュナは\n ギルザの岬で 死闘を くり広げ……\n 俺が駆け:
Galatea and Varashna fought to the death on
the Gilza Cape, and by the time I got there...
it was already all over.

308597.「遺体もなく ただ ガラテアが愛用していた\n 神槍だけが その場に残されていた:
There were no bodies. Only Galatea's beloved
spear remained. Even the outcome of the
battle was not known...

308598.「魔祖の血族も バラシュナを欠いたせいで\n 勢いをなくした。結果 戦いには勝利:
Because of Varashna's defeat, the Antecedents
were weakened and lost their momentum. The
battle was won, but my heart remained clouded.

308599.「最前線に立つのは おやめください！\n もし 王が倒れれば 国は瓦解します。:
Please, you mustn't stand at the front lines!
If the king falls, then so too does his
kingdom!

308600.「俺を 老いぼれ扱いするなッ！\n 羅刹王を倒せるのは 俺だけだ！:
Don't treat me like some kind of old man!
I'm the only one who can defeat Varashna!

308601.「つわものは ほかにもおります。\n ですが 王は あなた おひとり。\n 替え:
There are other soldiers out there.
But you are the only one who is king. You
cannot be replaced, Father...

308602.「国家に忠を尽くした 兵のかがみであると\n 娘を ほこらしく思う日もあれば\n:
There are days where I am proud that my daughter is such a loyal soldier...and there are days when I am ashamed of how
disobedient she was.

308603.「ただ バラシュナとの一騎打ちが\n 満足のいく戦いであったなら 武人として\n:
But if her one on one combat with Varashna had
been satisfying, then that life as a warrior
must've been a happy one...

308604.「どうか そうであってほしい。: I truly hope that was the case.

308605.「ふたりとも こちらに いたのですね！\n 天の箱舟の整備が 終わりました。\n:
So you were both here after all! The
Starflight Express is ready now. We can leave
for the Eye of Evil at any time.

308607.「はい……。もう なんともありません。\n ご心配をおかけして すみませんでした:
Yes...there's no need to worry anymore.
I apologize for causing you distress.

308608.「無事 つとめにも 復帰できました。\n 天使長を始め 審判の天使の方々には\n:
I was able to safely return to my duties. The Archangel and even the Angels of Judgment really put me through the wringer,
though...

308609.「それは 当然だろう。誰にも 何も相談せず\n なんだって あんな無謀なことを…:
It's only natural. It was quite reckless to go
off on your own like that without telling
anyone...

308610.「神になりたかった わけではなく\n あなた方と共に 戦い続けたかった。\n 本:
I didn't want to become a god. I only wanted
to keep fighting alongside you. Really, that's
all...

308611.「となりに立つのに ふさわしい存在に\n なりたかった。ですが それもかなわず…:
I wanted to become someone worthy of standing
by your side. But in the end...I suppose it
was just an unrealistic wish of mine.

308612.「ガートラント建国を決意したとき 俺は\n 一介の戦士に すぎなかった。何かをな:
When I decided to found Gartlant, I was but
a mere warrior. It was pointless to think
about whether or not I was worthy.

308613.「お前が 奇跡のような 回復をとげたのには\n 大きな意思が はたらいてるように:
It seems to me that there's a strong will at
work behind your miraculous recovery.

308614.「今は 見えないかも しれないが……\n お前には お前だけが進める 道があるは:
You may not see it now, but...there is a path
that only you can walk.

308615.「その道を見つけたとき お前も\n 俺たちと 並び立つ存在になっているだろう。\:
When you find that path, you will become one
who stands beside us. This is all I can say
for now.

308616.「私だけの道……ですか。\n ありがとうございます ラダ・ガート。\n その言葉:
A path only I can walk... Thank you, Lada
Gart. I will keep your words close to my
heart.

308617.「どんな形でもいい。これからも\n あなたたちと 共に戦いたいです。:
I don't care how, but I want to continue to
fight alongside you all.

308618.「あっ！ 大事なことを 言い忘れてました。\n 天の箱舟は とこしえの神殿の地下:
Oh! I forgot to tell you something important. The Starflight Express is located in the Temple of Eternity's basement. It's in the
landing inside the Hidden Hangar.

308619.「天の箱舟には 側面の乗降口から\n 乗車できるので 中に入って\n 待機してい:
We've been asked to board the Express from
the side entrance and wait, so let's head
there and get ready.

308620.<center>最終安全装置 解除。\n総員 耐ショック防御。\nくり返す 総員:
FINAL SAFEGUARD DISENGAGED. ALL PERSONNEL,
BRACE FOR SHOCK RESISTANCE. I REPEAT, ALL
PERSONNEL, BRACE FOR SHOCK RESISTANCE.

308621.<center>発射前の 秒読みを省略する。\n滅浄の大光 発射！:
OMITTING FIRING COUNTDOWN SEQUENCE.
FIRING PURGING PULSE!

308622.<center>要塞全域に 緊急警報を発令。\n念晶結界 消失。機関部 および\:
FORTRESS EMERGENCY ALERT. TELECRYSTAL WARD
DISSIPATING. CRITICAL DAMAGE REPORTED IN THE
CANNON'S ENGINE AREA...

308623.<center>くり返す。\n念晶結界 消失。機関部 および\n魔眼砲に 重大事:
I REPEAT, CRITICAL DAMAGE REPORTED IN THE
CANNON'S ENGINE AREA...

308624.「すごい音……。これで 魔眼砲を\n 無力化できたのでしょうか？:
That was quite the noise...does this mean
we've disabled the cannon for good?

308625.「ええ！ 作戦は大成功です。\n ご丁寧に さっきの声が 重大事故だと\n 教え:
Yes! The operation was executed perfectly.
That voice just now politely informed us

308626.「今ので みなさんにも 機関部の破壊を\n なしとげたことが 伝わったはず。:
By now, I'm sure everyone else was able to
see that we accomplished destroying the
engine.

308627.「この破壊で 敵の張っていた力場も消え\n 翼を使えるように なったみたいです。:
With the engine destroyed, the enemy's ward
seems to have dissipated, too. We can use our
wings now, so let's get out of here!

308628.「そうなんですが……\n 来た道は 引き返せないようです。:
You're right, but...it doesn't look like we
can go back the way we came.

308629.「どちらの扉に 進めばよいものか……。\n こういうときこそ 念晶環で……！:
Which door should we use...?
Oh, we can use the Telecrystal Ring!

308630.「発見した 侵入者を！\n 好き勝手はさせん これ以上は！:
Intruders have been found! We will no longer
allow you to do as you please!

308631.「ジア・クトに歯向かう 虫けらども！\n 駆除してやる！ １匹残らずぅ！:
You worms that stand against Dia Kut!
We will exterminate you! Every last one!

308634.「……あそこに 戻ろうとしている？\n ならば！:
You're trying to go back there?
If so...!

308637.「死にぞこないを かばうか……。\n 勝利の機会を捨てるとは おろかな。:
Protecting others to escape death...
at the cost of forsaking victory?

308638.「間一髪 でしたね。こいつらを……\n 倒すには……少々 コツがいるんです。:
That was close. It takes...quite a bit of
technique...to beat these.

308639.「ここは 私にまかせて……おふたりは\n ゲノスを 討ち取ってください。:
Leave this to me...you two, please go and
deal with Genos.

308640.「遅きに失したな。メルド結晶化し\n 魔眼の月と 完全に一体化した 余を前に\n:
You are too late. With Meldo crystallization
and becoming one with the Eye of Evil, no
lifeform exists that can survive before me!

308641.「この姿……ジア・メルド・ゲノスとなったのは\n 青き妖精どもを 滅ぼして以来…:
I became this formーDia Meldo Genosー
after the annihilation of those wretched blue
fairies...

308642.「万象の征服者たる姿\n その目に焼きつけ 死にゆくがよいッ！！:
Gaze upon the form of the Conqueror of All
Existence, and embrace your imminent demise!!

308643.「１匹ずつ つぶすのも面倒だ。\n まとめて 始末してやろう……。:
It's much too troublesome to defeat you one by
one. I will destroy you all at once...

308644.「……私は ここまでのようです。\n 残されたチカラで 私の神の翼を\n あなた:
I think this is as far as I can go. With what
little strength I have left, I bestow my
divine wings upon you.

308645.「どうか 悲しまないで……。\n 追いつけただけでも 奇跡だった。:
Please, don't be sad...it's a miracle I was
even able to catch up to you.

308646.「さあ 行って！\n 奴を倒してください。英雄 <cs_pchero>！:
Now go! Take him down!
Champion <cs_pchero>!

308649.「悲しむのは あとだ。奴の頭上に 回り込むぞ！:
You can grieve later. We should circle around
above him!

308650.「私たちのチカラを ぞんぶんに発揮するには\n 地に足をつけて 戦える場が必要で:
We need a place where we can stand and fight
with all of our power...

308651.「光輪よ！ 我が願いにこたえ\n 戦いの場を作りだせ！:
O great halo! Create for me a circle for
combat!

308652.「ぬおう！ 念晶体が！？\n 引っぱられる……。:
Hrrrm?! My telecrystal...?!
It's being pulled in...

308653.「私が 戦いの場を維持します。\n その間に ゲノスを倒してください！:
I will maintain this battlefield. You must
defeat Genos!

308654.「あれを 維持するだけなら\n わたくしたちのチカラでも 可能でしょう。\n ユ:
If we lend our help, we should be able to
maintain it. Yuliza, you should join the
battle.

308655.「ぜひ そうしてくれ。神化した君は\n この戦いに 欠かせない。:
You should by all means. As you are now
deified, you are invaluable to this fight.

308656.「<cs_pchero>と ユーライザにだけ\n いい格好は させられんな。\n:
I can't just let <cs_pchero> and
Yuliza have all the glory! Allow me a chance
to swing my swords!

308657.「戦いの場の維持は\n ボクら ３人に まかせてください。:
Leave it to the three of us to maintain the
battlefield.

308658.「いきましょう！ 最後の戦いです！: Come on! This is the final battle!

308659.「地べたに 足をつけないと\n ろくに戦えぬとは……哀れな。\n だが そなたら:
How pathetic that you cannot fight without
your feet planted firmly on the ground...
Though it does suit you well.

308660.「１匹残らず 塵芥に変えてやろう。: Every last one of you shall be turned to dust!

308661.「フフフ……メルド結晶化し 魔眼の月と\n 一体となった余が 消滅したら\n 何:
Hmm hmm hmm... I will indulge you with what happens when I, a being who has undergone Meldo crystallization and merged with the
Eye of Evil, disappears...

308662.「魔眼の月は 制御を失い 浮力も消えうせる。\n ほどなくして 下界へと墜ちてい:
The Eye of Evil will lose control and its
ability to float. Soon, it will crash down
belowーa meteor of your final days!

308663.「残っている お前の同胞は どうなる？\n 見殺しにする気か？:
What of the rest of your kin? You're just
going to allow them to die?

308664.「魔眼の月こそは 我らの生まれいずる故郷。\n 月と運命を共にするのは 我らのさ:
The Eye of Evil is our birthplace. Our fate is
intertwined with that of the Eye. If I command
death, then all will die gladly.

308665.「余の念晶体は ここで滅ぶが……フム！\n 存外 再会の時は 近いかもしれんぞ。:
My telecrystal will perish here, but...hmph!
The time of our reunion may come sooner
than you realize.

308667.「見てください！！ 魔眼の月が……。: Look! The Eye of Evil is...!

308668.「このままじゃ 世界が滅んじゃう。\n どうやって 阻止すればいいのかな？\n:
If we do nothing, then the world will be
destroyed...how can we stop it? It's
leagues bigger than the Telecrystal Titan...

308669.「念晶巨人か……。あの戦いの 決着をつけるのに\n 我々の命脈を ありったけ 神:
Telecrystal Titan...? We devoted our entire
life energy to the divine sword in order to
end that battle. Why not try it again?

308670.「王を失い ジア・クトも混乱している。\n もはや 私たちが何をなそうと\n 攻:
Their ruler has been lost, so Dia Kut is in
disarray. Regardless of what we do, they
are in no position to attack us.

308671.「みなさーん 無事ですかー？\n 魔眼の月が 下降してるようですけど\n 何が起:
Heeey, everyone! Are you all right?
The Eye of Evil seems to be falling!
What is going on?

308673.「<cs_pchero> 神剣はありますね？ \n 天の箱舟で下に回り込み 魔眼:
You have the divine sword, right? Let's use
the Starflight Express to get under the Eye
of Evil, then shatter it!

308674.「<pc>！\n こいつは 俺たちの知る ルーベじゃない！:
<pc>! This is not the Rubay we knew
before!

308676.「神剣を出せ！ <pc>！\n こいつを たたき斬るんだ！:
<pc>! The divine sword!
You must cut her down!

308677.「俺に かまわず やれッ！！: Don't worry about me! Just do it!!

308678.「待て！ 不毛な殺しあいは\n よそうではないか。:
Wait! This doesn't need to devolve into
senseless violence, does it?

308679.「どのクチが 言うか！: The nerve to say such a thing...!

308680.「そなたらの攻撃で 魔眼の月は消滅し\n ジア・クト念晶体の 選ばれし原石は\n:
With your attack, the Eye of Evil is gone.
Leaving on Dia Rubay as the chosen
Primestone of the Dia Kut telecrystal.

308681.「種の定めにより 最後に残った\n 選ばれし原石の中に 余は 復活した。\n ジ:
By the laws of my species, I have been
resurrected with the chosen Primestone.
My consciousness is that of Dia Ledo Genos.

308682.「いや レドは 前任者の名……。\n これからは ジア・ルーベ・ゲノスと名乗ろう:
No, Ledo was my former name...
From henceforth, I shall be known as Dia
Rubay Genos.

308683.「そなたにも 教えてやろう。\n ジア・クトが 創生のチカラを生産できず\n 侵:
Allow me to tell you. Why Dia Kut has
repeatedly invaded and harvested, unable
to produce the power of creation.

308684.「すべては とこしえのゆりかごを\n 侵略したことが 始まりだった。:
It all began with the invasion of the Eternal
Cradle.

308685.「かの地での戦いの結果……\n 我らは 一切の創生を生みだす すべを失い\n た:
As a result of the war in that place... We
lost the ability to create anything at all,
and have been reduced to mere consumption.

308686.「ゆえに 我らは 創生のチカラを求め\n 幾多の世界を侵略し 収奪を くり返して:
That is why we have repeatedly invaded and
harvested many worlds in search of the power
of creation. All of this was for our survival.

308687.「ただ 創世神ルティアナは ゆりかご世界の\n 神であったと聞く。ならば この世:
However...it is said that Lutiana, Goddess of Creation, was the god of the Cradle's world. If that is true, then there may be a clue to
saving our species...

308688.「余は 神化という秘儀に 賭けてみたい！\n 神の座に至れば ジア・クトに降りか:
I will bet on the mystery behind deification! If I can reach the heights of godhood, then perhaps I can uncover the truth of the evil
that befell Dia Kut!

308689.「神化を ためさせてくれ！\n かなえてくれるなら ジア・クトの\n 持てる知識:
Allow me to attempt deification! Do so, and
I will give you all the knowledge that Dia
Kut has to offer.

308690.「……たとえ 神化に失敗しても\n 侵略も収奪も おこなわぬ。滅びゆく種族に\n:
Even if deification fails, we will be unable
to invade or harvest. Please...will you not
show mercy on our dying race?

308691.「こいつが 神化に成功すれば どんな悲劇を\n 生み落とすか わかったものではな:
There is no telling what kind of disaster your
deification would bring if successful!
Dia Kut must be destroyed here and now!

308692.「ええい クチをはさむな！！ \n 余は この者にこそ 問うておる！\n 手をた:
Don't interrupt me!!
I ask you this, above all othersー
Join hands with me, so we may walk together!

308694.<pc>は ジア・ルーベ・ゲノスに\n手を差し出そうとした。:
<pc> tried reaching out to Dia Rubay
Genos.

308695.「そうだ この手をつかめ！\n ためらう必要など 皆無。\n 希望の未来を 共に:
Yes, that's it! Take my hand! There is no
need for hesitation. Let us walk together
to a future filled with hope.

308696.「正気か！ 考え直せ <pc>！\n 武器で脅す奴と 交渉など 成立せん！:
Are you insane?! Think, <pc>!
You can't negotiate someone who threatens
you with a weapon!

308697.ジア・ルーベ・ゲノスの 手をこばみ\n神剣で とどめを刺しますか？<yesno>:
Finish off Dia Rubay Genos using the divine
sword?<yesno><close>

308698.「待て！ 待つのだ！\n この者が どうなっても よいのか？:
Wait just a moment!
What do you think will happen to him,
hm?

308699.「本性をあらわしたな！\n こやつは結局 自分だけが 大切なのだ。\n 俺たちに:
She's revealed her true nature! She only
cares for herself! We have no choice but
to kill her!

308700.ジア・ルーベ・ゲノスの 手をこばみ\n神剣で とどめを刺しますか？<yesno>:
Finish off Dia Rubay Genos using the divine
sword?<yesno><close>

308701.<pc>は 右手を差しだし\nジア・ルーベ・ゲノスと 握手を交わした。:
<pc> held out their right hand,
and joined hands with Dia Rubay Genos.

308703.「ダメだ 考え直せ！\n お前の選択は 破滅への道だ！:
No! You must reconsider! Your choice will
only lead to a road filled with ruin!

308704.ジア・ルーベ・ゲノスは\nラダ・ガートの喉元を 剣で斬り裂いた！:
Zia Rubay Genos slashed at Lada Gart's throat
with his sword!

308705.どれだけ チカラを込めても\n<pc>は ジア・ルーベ・ゲノスの手を\nはなすこ:
No matter how hard they try,
<pc> cannot let go of Dia
Rubay Genos' hand...

308706.「やはり 相容れぬか……。残念だ。:
I suppose we aren't compatible after all...
What a shame.

308707.ジア・ルーベ・ゲノスの凶刃が\n<pc>に 致命傷を与えた。\nそこで <pc>:
Dia Rubay Genos' wicked blade inflicted a
fatal wound upon <pc>. And
thus, their consciousness faded away...

308709.<center>とこしえのゆりかごで 生まれた厄災は\nやがて この世界にも手を:
The calamity born in the Eternal Cradle will
eventually reach this world. It will destroy
everything in its path...

308710.「後味が悪いことをさせて すまなかったな。\n 俺ひとりで ケリをつけられれば\:
I'm sorry for turning things unpleasant.
I wish I could've handled this on my own...

308711.「きっと 心優しい お前のことだ。\n 敵といえど 手にかけてしまったことへの\:
Surely, it's because of your kind heart. Even
when facing your enemies, you may be ridden
with the guilt of the lives you've taken.

308712.「だが これだけは 忘れてくれるな。\n たとえ 自分を責めようと お前の決断を:
But never forget this one thingーno matter how much you blame yourself, I will always support your decision. I will forever be on
your side.

308713.「何が 人を英雄たらしめるか……\n 後世になってみないと わからん。\n おろ:
What makes a person a champion...? We may not
know until future generations look back at us.
Who knows, we may even be branded as fools.

308714.「時に おろかとも取られる行動を\n ためらわない者こそが 真の英雄なのだろう。:
A true champion is one who acts without
hesitation, even if it may be foolish. And
those decisions may lead to loneliness...

308715.「英雄のよろこびも 悲しみも\n 同じ立場の者としか 共有できんからな。:
The joys and sorrows of being a champion can
only be shared by those in the same position.

308716.「ここでの日々は 苦楽を分かちあえる友を\n たくさん得られて しあわせだった。:
These days here were filled with joy and
sorrow, and I was fortunate to have gained
many friends with whom I could share them.

313216.「ふははは……命拾いしたな。\n 神化に成功し 絶大なチカラを得たなら\n お前:
Fuhahaha...you saved your own lives. If I had
succeeded in deification, I would've gained an
